      requestBody:

              type: object

                  type: string

                  properties:
                    test:
                      type: string

                test3:
                  type: object
                  description: A test object - required
                  properties:
                    test:
                      type: string
                      description: A test string
              required: ["test", "test3"]
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PostResponse'
      summary: Post test data
components:
  schemas:
    PostResponse:
      properties:
        body:
          description: post test data response body
          type: string
      type: object
      required: ["body"]
